itemdesc-pistol:
Bronze wheel-lock pistol. Copper alloys cannot produce sparks, so rusty gear is used instead.

  Damage: 12
  Reload: 4s + 2s
  Powder charge: 3 + 1
  Ammo: bullet

Needs bullet, linen patch and powder flask for reload. Needs 'Cocking lever' in inventory for 2nd stage of reload.

To reload or aim - hold right mouse button.
To shoot - click left mouse button while aiming.

Current recipe is just a placeholder. Check 'Info log' chat for missing reload requirement.
itemdesc-arquebus:
Match-lock firearm of relatively simple construction that does not require advanced materials.

  Damage: 20
  Reload: 7s + 2s + 1s
  Powder charge: 7 + 1
  Ammo: bullet

Needs bullet, linen patch and powder flask for reload. Needs lit 'Match' in off-hand for last stage of reload and shooting.
To reload or aim - hold right mouse button.
To shoot - click left mouse button while aiming.

Current recipe is just a placeholder. Check 'Info log' chat for missing reload requirement.
itemdesc-musket-*:
Very high power firearm that can be equipped with bayonet.

  Damage: 63
  Reload: 15s + 3s
  Powder charge: 15 + 1
  Ammo: slug

Needs slug, linen patch and powder flask for reload.

To attach bayonet take in off-hand and press: Shift + Ctrl + right mouse button.
To reload or aim - hold right mouse button.
To shoot - click left mouse button while aiming.

Current recipe is just a placeholder. Check 'Info log' chat for missing reload requirement.
itemdesc-carbine:
Advanced flint-lock firearm that requires steel for good quality springs and strong barrel.

  Damage: 39
  Reload: 9s + 3s
  Powder charge: 11 + 1
  Ammo: slug

Needs slug, linen patch and powder flask for reload.

To reload or aim - hold right mouse button.
To shoot - click left mouse button while aiming.

Current recipe is just a placeholder. Check 'Info log' chat for missing reload requirement.
itemdesc-powderflask:
Take gunpowder (not blasting powder) in off-hand and then click right mouse button to fill the flask.
Flask durability represents amount of powder in the flask.

Current recipe is just a placeholder.
